mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.title, a.request_uri as "requestUri", a.detail, a.ip, a.method, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", u.login_name AS "createBy.loginName", a.CREATE_DATE AS "createDate", o.name AS "createBy.office.name" FROM sys_log a JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = u.office_id WHERE 1=1
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND a.ip LIKE '%'||#{ip}||'%' '%'+#{ip}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{ip}, '%')
AND a.create_by = #{createBy.id}
AND a.request_uri LIKE '%'||#{requestUri}||'%' '%'+#{requestUri}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{requestUri}, '%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND a.type = #{TYPE_EXCEPTION}
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
SELECT a.title, a.request_uri as "requestUri", a.detail, a.ip, a.CREATE_DATE AS "createDate", a.params, a.exception FROM sys_log a where a.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_log( id, type, title, create_by, create_date, ip, request_uri, method, params, exception ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{title}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{ip}, #{requestUri}, #{method}, #{params}, #{exception} )
